Mousieur Claude
http://is.gd/jeVTxQ

PEBEO DECO ACRYLIC MATT ANTIQUE PAINT SET 5 x 45ML/1.5 fl.oz

£14.44 INC P&P

Transform dull, monotonous rooms and banish dreary interior decoration, bring colour into the home, from basement to attic, on walls and on furniture to liven up your interior decoration, let P.BO Deco really bring your home to life!

http://aarjart.com/
http://aarjart.ebid.net/
http://www.amazon.co.uk/shops/aarjart/
PEBEO DECO ACRYLIC MATT ANTIQUE PAINT SET 5X45ml FREE P 3167862040555 on eBid United Kingdom
is.gd
PEBEO DECO ACRYLIC MATT ANTIQUE PAINT SET 5X45ml FREE P Auction in the Paints,Painting Supplies,Art & Painting Supplies,Crafts & Sewing Category on eBid United Kingdom

Product Information

P.BO deco all surface paint : wood, plaster, cardboard, acrylic colours

Properties :

QUALITY : Opaque acrylic to water for all surfaces
COLOUR MIXABILITY : Colours can be mixed together
DRYING : Drying out of dust 30min. A heart 24 hours
SURFACES : Wood, plaster, terracotta, metal, salt dough, cardboard, stone, paper ...
THINNER : Water
OPACITY : Opaque
FINISH : Matt, glossy or pearl
COVERAGE : 45 ml ? 0.5 m
CARING (decorated surfaces) : Supports a light habd washing without soaking
BRUSHES : Pébéo Cobra deco or Iris brushes, foam rollers and foam brushes, stencil brushes ...
BRUSH CLEANING : Soapy water
NUMBER OF COLOURS : 50 matt colours, 20 glossy colours, 10 pearl colours
PACKAGING : 45ml bottle - all colours.
STANDARDS : Meets toy safety standard 71.3

Product Usage :

P.BO deco acrylics are available in 80 colours to explore many surfaces and vary the decor.
Choose from 3 ranges of finishes : 40 matt, 20 glossy and finally 10 pearl colours. Ready to use,
can be diluted with water and can be mixed together, they have everything to please and are water
resistant once dry. They allow you to decorate without constraints any object of your choice and
are suitable for all techniques. The range of Vintage or Modern auxiliaries allow you to obtain
even more effects.

PEBEO VITREA 160 GLASS PRIMARY PAINT SET 5x45ML/1.5 floz

Mousieur Claude
http://is.gd/YkRBdA

PEBEO VITREA 160 GLASS PRIMARY PAINT SET 5x45ML/1.5 floz

£22.44 INC UK P&P
...
Vitrea 160: Remarkably transparent colours for glass, glossy or frosted versions. Water based colours combine professional quality and ease of use. After baking at 160°C (325°F) in a domestic oven, the paints are dishwasher safe.

http://aarjart.com/
http://aarjart.ebid.net/
http://www.amazon.co.uk/shops/aarjart/
PEBEO VITREA 160 GLASS PRIMARY PAINT SET 5x45ml FREE P 3167861110204 on eBid United Kingdom
is.gd
PEBEO VITREA 160 GLASS PRIMARY PAINT SET 5x45ml FREE P Auction in the Paints,Painting Supplies,Art & Painting Supplies,Crafts & Sewing Category on eBid United Kingdom

Glass Paint

Properties :

QUALITY : Water based colours for glass, declined in gloss, frosted or shimmer, remarkably transparent and bright. Excellent lightfastness.
COLOUR MIXABILITY : Colours can be mixed together
DRYING : tack-free in a few minutes, fully dry in minimum 24 hours. 40 minutes at 160°C (325°F) (steady temperature) in a domestic oven, after minimum 24 hours drying.
SURFACES : glass, crystal ...
THINNER : Vitrea 160 thinner
OPACITY : Transparent colours
FINISH : Brilliant, frosted or shimmer
CARING (decorated surfaces) : after baking, remarkable resistance to use in dishwashers and to normal solvents and detergents
BRUSHES : Pébéo Cobra deco or Iris brushes
BRUSH CLEANING : Soapy water
NUMBER OF COLOURS : 20 brilliant colours, 10 frosted colours, 5 shimmer colours
PACKAGING : 45ml bottle - all colours. Glossy markers - 9 colours. Frosted markers - 9 colours. Outliners - 10 colours
STANDARDS : conforms to toy safety standard 71.3

Product Usage :

30 remarkably transparent colours and 5 brand new shimmer shades for magnificient decorations on glass. Available in glossy or frosted, the Vitrea 160 colours combine professional quality and ease of use. After baking at 160°C (325°F) in a domestic oven, the depth of the colour is enhanced and the paints are dishwasher safe. Applied on glass and crystal, the transparency of Vitrea 160 colours allows you to take full advantage of the light. However, Vitrea 160 can be applied on other thermostable surfaces which can withstand a temperature of 160°C (325°F).

Vitrea 160 are ready to use colours. Available in liquid, paste or felt tip markers, the Vitrea 160 colours display the same characteristics and properties. Either used alone or together, you are completely free to experiment with the effects and techniques of the paints. The glossy or frosted appearance of the colours provides an infinite variety of light and shadow effects. After baking, colours are exceptionally intense and glass seems to be bodydyed. To thin colours, use the Vitrea 160 thinner. Gloss and frosted medium are used to lighten the colours without changing their technical characteristics ; iridescent medium, when mixed with colours, produces iridescent colours. To obtain a crackle finish, first apply the crackling medium step 1, followed by the step 2 and then paint over with colour.

Before painting with Vitrea 160, simply degrease with alcohol or soapy water. Allow to air dry for 24 hours, then bake in an ordinary domestic oven. Place the decorated object in a cold oven. Once the temperature has reached 160°C (325°F), allow to bake for 40 minutes. After baking, colours are dishwasher safe and resistant to detergents and common solvents. Only the areas not intended to be put in contact with food must be decorated.
Store markers flatwise.

The Vitrea 160 markers resistant washing even if not baked.

Glass Paint

Properties :

QUALITY : Water based colours for glass, declined in gloss, frosted or shimmer, remarkably transparent and bright. Excellent lightfastness.
COLOUR MIXABILITY : Colours can be mixed together
DRYING : tack-free in a few minutes, fully dry in minimum 24 hours. 40 minutes at 160°C (325°F) (steady temperature) in a domestic oven, after minimum 24 hours drying.
SURFACES : glass, crystal ...
THINNER : Vitrea 160 thinner
OPACITY : Transparent colours
FINISH : Brilliant, frosted or shimmer
CARING (decorated surfaces) : after baking, remarkable resistance to use in dishwashers and to normal solvents and detergents
BRUSHES : Pébéo Cobra deco or Iris brushes
BRUSH CLEANING : Soapy water
NUMBER OF COLOURS : 20 brilliant colours, 10 frosted colours, 5 shimmer colours
PACKAGING : 45ml bottle - all colours. Glossy markers - 9 colours. Frosted markers - 9 colours. Outliners - 10 colours
STANDARDS : conforms to toy safety standard 71.3

Product Usage :

30 remarkably transparent colours and 5 brand new shimmer shades for magnificient decorations on glass. Available in glossy or frosted, the Vitrea 160 colours combine professional quality and ease of use. After baking at 160°C (325°F) in a domestic oven, the depth of the colour is enhanced and the paints are dishwasher safe. Applied on glass and crystal, the transparency of Vitrea 160 colours allows you to take full advantage of the light. However, Vitrea 160 can be applied on other thermostable surfaces which can withstand a temperature of 160°C (325°F).

Vitrea 160 are ready to use colours. Available in liquid, paste or felt tip markers, the Vitrea 160 colours display the same characteristics and properties. Either used alone or together, you are completely free to experiment with the effects and techniques of the paints. The glossy or frosted appearance of the colours provides an infinite variety of light and shadow effects. After baking, colours are exceptionally intense and glass seems to be bodydyed. To thin colours, use the Vitrea 160 thinner. Gloss and frosted medium are used to lighten the colours without changing their technical characteristics ; iridescent medium, when mixed with colours, produces iridescent colours. To obtain a crackle finish, first apply the crackling medium step 1, followed by the step 2 and then paint over with colour.

Before painting with Vitrea 160, simply degrease with alcohol or soapy water. Allow to air dry for 24 hours, then bake in an ordinary domestic oven. Place the decorated object in a cold oven. Once the temperature has reached 160°C (325°F), allow to bake for 40 minutes. After baking, colours are dishwasher safe and resistant to detergents and common solvents. Only the areas not intended to be put in contact with food must be decorated.
Store markers flatwise.

The Vitrea 160 markers resistant washing even if not baked.
